system.description: Effect: If Make It Rain is used at least once in combat, the user and each of its allies rolls a Challenging Accounting Skill Check. a Simple Accounting Skill Check. On a success, a participant (or their Trainer, if they're an owned Pokemon), gains +1 to their Resources Skill per DoS.
